trends: There have been 12 other sightings in Silver Spring
There were no other sightings in Silver Spring on or around November 11th 2008
divs: Sighting DetailsOn 8-11-08 @ 12:00 pm I was waiting at the bus stop @layhill rd. and bel pre rd. in silver spring md.I was watching the cloud formation which seemed to be very low in the skyw when I witnessed a white sphere in between two clouds.The sky was blue so it was very easy to spot the object.It was stationary,did not move at all and emitted no sound.The object was in front of clouds in a background of blue sky.I know this because there was a light wind which blew the clouds behind the object.The sphere just hung in the air,I thought this object might be a probe because it seemed to just observe the surounding area.This sighting lasted about 5 min.only because my bus pulled up and I got on it.I ran to the drivers side of the bus,looked out the window and the object was still visable.I object was lost from my eyesight about 2 blocks away from the bus stop.This is the 4th sighting I have had in the silver spring area
Summary: white sphere in between two clouds
